verses.verse: And it came <WH1961> to pass, when <WH834> all <WH3605> the people <WH1471> were clean <WH8552> passed <WH5674> over <WH5674> Jordan, <WH3383> that the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH559> to Joshua, <WH3091> saying, <WH559>
Take <WH3947> you twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> men <WH582> out of the people, <WH5971> out of every tribe <WH7626> a man, <WH376>

And command <WH6680> you them, saying, <WH559> Take <WH5375> you hence <WH2088> out of the middle <WH8432> of Jordan, <WH3383> out of the place where the priests' <WH3548> feet <WH7272> stood <WH4673> firm, <WH3559> twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> stones, <WH68> and you shall carry <WH5674> them over <WH5674> with you, and leave <WH5117> them in the lodging <WH4411> place, where <WH834> you shall lodge <WH3885> this night. <WH3915>

Then Joshua <WH3091> called <WH7121> the twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> men, <WH376> whom <WH834> he had prepared <WH3559> of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> out of every tribe <WH7626> a man: <WH376>

And Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> to them, Pass <WH5674> over <WH5674> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> into <WH413> the middle <WH8432> of Jordan, <WH3383> and take <WH7311> you up every man <WH376> of you a stone <WH68> on his shoulder, <WH7926> according to the number <WH4557> of the tribes <WH7626> of the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478>

That this <WH2063> may be a sign <WH226> among <WH7130> you, that when <WH3588> your children <WH1121> ask <WH7592> their fathers in time <WH4279> to come, <WH4279> saying, <WH559> What <WH4100> mean you by these <WH428> stones? <WH68>

Then you shall answer <WH559> them, That the waters <WH4325> of Jordan <WH3383> were cut <WH3772> off before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD; <WH3068> when it passed <WH5674> over <WH5674> Jordan, <WH3383> the waters <WH4325> of Jordan <WH3383> were cut <WH3772> off: and these <WH428> stones <WH68> shall be for a memorial <WH2146> to the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> for ever. <WH5769>

And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> did <WH6213> so <WH3651> as Joshua <WH3091> commanded, <WH6680> and took <WH5375> up twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> stones <WH68> out of the middle <WH8432> of Jordan, <WH3383> as the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Joshua, <WH3091> according to the number <WH4557> of the tribes <WH7626> of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and carried <WH5674> them over <WH5674> with them to the place where <WH413> they lodged, <WH4411> and laid <WH3240> them down there. <WH8033>

And Joshua <WH3091> set <WH6965> up twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> stones <WH68> in the middle <WH8432> of Jordan, <WH3383> in the place where the feet <WH7272> of the priests <WH3548> which bore <WH5375> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> stood: <WH4673> and they are there <WH8033> to this <WH2063> day. <WH3117>

For the priests <WH3548> which bore <WH5375> the ark <WH727> stood <WH5975> in the middle <WH8432> of Jordan, <WH3383> until <WH5704> every <WH3605> thing <WH1697> was finished <WH8552> that the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Joshua <WH3091> to speak <WH1696> to the people, <WH5971> according to all <WH3605> that Moses <WH4872> commanded <WH6680> Joshua: <WH3091> and the people <WH5971> hurried <WH4116> and passed <WH5674> over. <WH5674>

And it came <WH1961> to pass, when <WH834> all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> were clean <WH8552> passed <WH5674> over, <WH5674> that the ark <WH727> of the LORD <WH3068> passed <WH5674> over, <WH5674> and the priests, <WH3548> in the presence <WH6440> of the people. <WH5971>

And the children <WH1121> of Reuben, <WH7205> and the children <WH1121> of Gad, <WH1410> and half <WH2677> the tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh, <WH4519> passed <WH5674> over <WH5674> armed <WH2571> before <WH6440> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> as Moses <WH4872> spoke <WH1696> to them:
About forty <WH705> thousand <WH505> prepared <WH2502> for war <WH6635> passed <WH5674> over <WH5674> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> to battle, <WH4421> to the plains <WH6160> of Jericho. <WH3405>

On that day <WH3117> the LORD <WH3068> magnified <WH1431> Joshua <WH3091> in the sight <WH5869> of all <WH3605> Israel; <WH3478> and they feared <WH3372> him, as they feared <WH3372> Moses, <WH4872> all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of his life. <WH2416>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH559> to Joshua, <WH3091> saying, <WH559>
Command <WH6680> the priests <WH3548> that bear <WH5375> the ark <WH727> of the testimony, <WH5715> that they come <WH5927> up out of Jordan. <WH3383>
Joshua <WH3091> therefore commanded <WH6680> the priests, <WH3548> saying, <WH559> Come <WH5927> you up out of Jordan. <WH3383>

And it came <WH1961> to pass, when the priests <WH3548> that bore <WH5375> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD <WH3068> were come <WH5927> up out of the middle <WH8432> of Jordan, <WH3383> and the soles <WH3709> of the priests' <WH3548> feet <WH7272> were lifted <WH5423> up to the dry <WH2724> land, that the waters <WH4325> of Jordan <WH3383> returned <WH7725> to their place, <WH4725> and flowed <WH3212> over <WH5921> all <WH3605> his banks, <WH1415> as they did before. <WH8543> <WH8032>

And the people <WH5971> came <WH5927> up out of Jordan <WH3383> on the tenth <WH6218> day of the first <WH7223> month, <WH2320> and encamped <WH2583> in Gilgal, <WH1537> in the east <WH4217> border <WH7097> of Jericho. <WH3405>
And those <WH428> twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> stones, <WH68> which <WH834> they took <WH3947> out of Jordan, <WH3383> did Joshua <WH3091> pitch <WH6965> in Gilgal. <WH1537>

And he spoke <WH559> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> saying, <WH559> When <WH834> your children <WH1121> shall ask <WH7592> their fathers <WH1> in time <WH4279> to come, <WH4279> saying, <WH559> What <WH4100> mean these <WH428> stones? <WH68>
Then you shall let your children <WH1121> know, <WH3045> saying, <WH559> Israel <WH3478> came <WH5674> over <WH5674> this <WH2088> Jordan <WH3383> on dry <WH3004> land.

For the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> dried <WH3001> up the waters <WH4325> of Jordan <WH3383> from before <WH6440> you, until <WH5704> you were passed <WH5674> over, <WH5674> as the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> did <WH6213> to the Red <WH5488> sea, <WH3220> which <WH834> he dried <WH3001> up from before <WH6440> us, until <WH5704> we were gone <WH5674> over: <WH5674>

That all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> of the earth <WH776> might know <WH3045> the hand <WH3027> of the LORD, <WH3068> that it is mighty: <WH2389> that you might fear <WH3372> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> for ever. <WH3605> <WH3117>
